## DefaultXrControllerSet.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `DefaultXrControllerSet` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(renderer: THREE.WebGLRenderer, camera: THREE.Camera, scene: THREE.Scene, handContainer: THREE.Object3D, moveTarget: THREE.Object3D, rotationTarget: THREE.Object3D, options?: PointerControllerOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  renderer | THREE.WebGLRenderer |  |
|  camera | THREE.Camera | Non-VR Camera |
|  scene | THREE.Scene |  |

|  moveTarget | THREE.Object3D | Object to teleport. |
|  rotationTarget | THREE.Object3D | Object to snap turn. |
